changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "runtime" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "state" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "readonly" BOOL NOT NULL, "last_deployed_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "config" JSONB NOT NULL, "current_release_id" UUID NULL, "cluster_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("current_release_id") REFERENCES "release" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("cluster_id") REFERENCES "cluster" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ); CREATE INDEX "idx_runtime_cluster_id" ON "runtime" ("cluster_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_runtime_current_release_id" ON "runtime" ("current_release_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "current_release_id" IS NOT NULL;
